alert.note: Alert for Eastern San Juan Mountains Above 10000 Ft; Eastern Sawatch Mountains above 11000 Ft; Western Mosquito Range, East Lake County Above 11000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 22 at 10:50PM MST until December 25 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THURSDAY TO 11 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 18 to 28 inches. Winds gusting as high as 65 mph. * WHERE...Western Mosquito Range, East Lake County and Eastern Sawatch Mountains Above 11000 Feet and the Eastern San Juan Mountains Above 10000 Feet. * WHEN...From 11 AM Thursday to 11 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact travelers over Wolf Creek and Monarch Passes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Eastern San Juan Mountains Above 10000 Ft; Eastern Sawatch Mountains above 11000 Ft; Western Mosquito Range, East Lake County Above 11000 Ft
